<caldate>2006</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>2006</srccurr> </srctime> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>Brown + Danos landdesign created the land use data set for the Louisiana Speaks Regional Plan South Louisiana study area combining two parishes with pre-existing land use inventories: East Baton Rouge and Orleans. For areas outside these two parishes, Brown + Danos interpreted and digitized data from 2004 US Geological Survey Digital Orthophoto Quarter Quadrangles (DOQQs). Brown + Danos hand-coded land uses based on the interpretation of these photographs.</procdesc> <procdate>20060301</procdate> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Dana Nunez Brown</cntper> <cntorg>Brown + Danos landdesign, inc.</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>Principal</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>BROWN+DANOS landdesign, inc.</address> <address>635 Louisiana Avenue</address> <city>Baton Rouge</city> <state>Louisiana</state> <postal>70802</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>(225) 381-3139</cntvoice> <cntfax>(225) 381-3140</cntfax> <cntemail>dbrown@browndanos.com</cntemail> <cntinst>Email is Preferred.</cntinst> </cntinfo> </proccont> </procstep> <procstep> <procdesc>Calthorpe Associates assembled the shapefiles provided by Brown + Danos landdesign, Inc, merging them into a single shapefile. The land use shapefile was projected into NAD 83, UTM Zone 15N, then clipped to the 35-parish Louisiana Speaks Regional Plan study area using ArcToolbox and ArcView 3.2.</procdesc> <procdate>20060401</procdate> <proccont> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>Eric Yurkovich</cntper> <cntorg>Calthorpe Associates</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntpos>Project Coordinator</cntpos> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2095 Rose Street, Suite 201</address> <city>Berkeley</city> <state>California</state> <postal>94709</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>(510) 548-6800</cntvoice> <cntfax>(510) 548-6848</cntfax> <cntemail>eric@calthorpe.com</cntemail> <hours>9 AM to 6 PM PST for phone calls.
